r.d: This extension allows you to access Oracle databases using the Oracle Call Interface (OCI8). It can be built with PHP 4.3.9 to 5.x. It can be linked with Oracle 9.2, 10.2, 11.1, or 11.2 client libraries.
r.n: Fixed bug #49560 (Using LOBs causes slow PHP shutdown) Fixed bug #47281 ($php_errormsg is limited in size of characters)
